pageDescription: Tools for developers to check and manage the application
prodWarning: This page is intended for development environment only. Using it in production may lead to data loss.
envDescription: Details about the application runtime environment
browserDescription: Details about the browser being used
toolsComingSoon: Developer tools will be available soon.
databaseDescription: Manage the Supabase database for development and testing
clickRefresh: Click the Refresh button to check the database status
resetDescription: Delete all data from the database
seedDescription: Add test data to the database
freshDescription: Delete all data and add test data
managerDescription: The Database Manager is a tool for developers that allows managing the Supabase database for development and testing. You can check the database status, reset data, and populate the database with test data.
checkDescription: Check if the required tables exist and are accessible.
resetDetailedDescription: Delete all data from existing tables. This operation cannot be undone.
seedDetailedDescription: Add test data to the database to facilitate development and testing.
freshDetailedDescription: Combine reset and seed operations in a single step.
warningDescription: This tool is intended for development environment only. Do not use these operations in production as they will delete real data.
checkTables: Check if all required database tables exist
tablesCreated: Missing tables have been successfully created
confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the database? All data will be deleted.
confirmFresh: Are you sure you want to reset and seed the database? All existing data will be deleted.
seedSuccess: Database has been seeded with test data successfully
freshSuccess: Database has been reset and seeded with test data successfully
